text:
At the end of the process laid down in Article 59 of REACH, the substance may be included in the
Candidate List â€“ which is the list relevant for the identification of SVHCs (please see ID 301).
As the inclusion of substances in the Candidate List results in a number of immediate legal
obligations on listing substances on their own, in mixtures and in articles, it is an indication that
these substances are of concern to authorities and that they might be prioritised for further
regulation.
